bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
During test case implementation, found that src API does not work.
tensorsinfo fetch with gethandle does not work (NYI) src_inputdata somehow results in garbage data.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1343>#1343</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
